snippet: London takes on France as the Heineken Cup, rugby union's answer to soccer's Champions League, reaches weekend five of its six-match pool stage.
lead_paragraph: London takes on France as the Heineken Cup, rugby union's answer to soccer's Champions League, reaches weekend five of its six-match pool stage.

headline.main: A Make-or-Break Weekend Shapes Up in Heineken Cup
headline.print_headline: A Make-Or-Break Weekend Shapes Up in Heineken Cup
